alert.note: Alert for Benton; Marshall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 6:03PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Marshall and southwestern Benton Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 602 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Holly Springs, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Holly Springs, Snow Lake Shores, Ashland, Potts Camp, Atway, Mack, Mahon, Hudsonville, Higdon, Gilton, Waites and Lake Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
